name: Tubes - Jump through the burst of balls hitting the walls
name_original: Tubes - Jump through the burst of balls hitting the walls
description:
Are you ready to tap?

Tap the ball carefully to make it pass the shooting tubes.

But beware! The tubes shoot rapidly balls of different colors in different patterns, so if you lose focus you might get hit and have to start again!

Features:

◉ Minimalist design;

◉ Colorful balls;

◉ Addictive soundtrack;

◉ Simple to play, difficult to master;

Tubes is incredibly challenging and beautifully designed! Have a look at the screenshots and see for yourself. You will not be disappointed, so don't wait and PLAY IT NOW!
